Class Chmod

java.lang.Object

public class Chmod
extends AntTask<org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Chmod>

Chmod equivalent for unix-like environments.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Chmod)

setParallel

public Chmod setParallel(boolean val)
Set whether to execute in parallel mode. If true, run the command only once, appending all files as arguments. If false, command will be executed once for every file. Defaults to false.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.ExecuteOn.setParallel)
